en.title: Welcome
en.extract: In that Macondo forgotten even by the birds, where the dust and heat had become so tenacious that it was difficult to breathe, enclosed by loneliness and love and by the solitude of love in a house where it was almost impossible to sleep because of the Din of colored ants, Aureliano and Amaranta Ãšrsula were the only happy and happiest beings on earth.
